author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-6419. Adds SASL based authentication to RPC. Contributed by Kan Zhang.

author: johnh
msg: 1. Fix subtle NPE occurring when UriBuilder-generated Uri with null path is base in a relative resolution.
2. Catch Runtime DOMException in fragment parser API.

author: hlship
msg: Split the trigger behavior for zone updates into two parts (the initial "click" event, and a new Tapestry event) so faciliate splicing in a confirmation step between the two.

author: yanz
msg: PIG-1201: unnecessary name node calls by each mapper; too big input split serialization size by Pig's Slice implementation (yanz)
